titleStmt.title: An astrological and theologigal [sic] discourse upon this great conjunction (the like whereof hath not (likely) been in some ages) ushered in by a great comet and so far upon the heavens, the planets and fixed stars as is a necessary introduction into a distinct and full knowledg of the principal subject herein handled.
titleStmt.author: Ness, Christopher, 1621-1705.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
